content:
# It seems that I made another mistake regarding the inventory. The error indicates that I no longer have any coal available to insert into the furnace, which is necessary for smelting.

# Since I need coal to fuel the furnace for smelting, I will have to gather some coal from the nearest coal patch before I can proceed with smelting the iron ore.

# I will find the nearest coal resource patch and harvest some coal.

coal_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Find the nearest coal patch
move_to(coal_position)  # Move to the coal patch
harvest_resource(coal_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest some coal

# After harvesting coal, I will check the updated inventory to confirm the amount of coal collected.
print(f"Inventory updated to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Verify the inventory after harvesting coal.
